description.value:
Special: Scatter

Note: Target suffers 2d10 Intelligence damage on hit (ignores armour/toughness), make -20 Toughness Test or be stunned for 1 Round. Foes with Daemonic, Machine, Strange Physiology, or The Stuff of Nightmares Traits are unaffected by this weapon.
